ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We acknowledge support of this work by the project “OPENSCREEN-GR: An Open-Access Research Infrastructure of Target-Based Screening Technologies and Chemical Biology for Human and Animal Health, Agriculture and Environment” (MIS ‎5002691) which is implemented under the Action “Reinforcement of the Research and Innovation Infrastructure”, funded by the Operational Programme “Competitiveness, Entrepreneurship and Innovation” (NSRF ‎2014-2020) and co-financed by Greece and the European Union (European Regional 326 Development Fund). Start-up funds provided by the MDRT “Bioeconomy” at Northumbria University-Newcastle, UK to M.I.P. are kindly acknowledged. The authors thank C. Tassou for providing full access to microplate reader equipment, N. Chorianopoulos for his valuable technical support and scientific advice, and greatly acknowledge the assistance of Eleni Papavasilopoulou and Dimitris Georganakis from VIORYL S.A.
